main event: An unidentified object was sighted during a recovery operation near Ascension Island on June 24, 1960.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a plane, but it did not appear on radar, leading to the conclusion that it was not a conventional aircraft., The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds., Witnesses were military and civilian personnel present during the operation., The object was described as an atypical phenomenon, not readily identifiable., This report is part of the historical Project Blue Book investigation into UFO sightings.
witness description: military and civilian personnel involved in the operation
